alert.note: Alert for Dawson, McCone, Prairie, Richland, Wibaux Counties; Fort Peck Reservation and Daniels, Roosevelt, Sheridan Counties; Northern Valley and Northern Phillips Counties; Southern Petroleum and Southern Garfield Counties; The Little Rockies; The Lower Missouri River Breaks including the Charles M Russell National Wildlife Refuge (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 17 at 2:48AM MDT until September 18 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...ELEVATED TO CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS EXPECTED FOR TODAY AND MONDAY ... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 9 PM MDT MONDAY FOR LOW HUMIDITY AND GUSTY WINDS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 120, 122, 134, 135, 136, AND 137... * AFFECTED AREAS...All of Northeast Montana. * TIMING...During the midday to early evening hours both today and Monday. * WINDS...For today, from the west at 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. For Monday, from the west at 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...For today, as low as 7 percent. For Monday, as low as 13 percent. * TEMPERATURES...For today, highs in the mid 80s to mid 90s. For Monday, highs in the upper 70s to upper 80s. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly toward the east. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in these areas of this Red Flag Warning.
